lines: mang mang rgyal ba sras bcas kun gyi yab
zab zab mkhyen rab ma lus 'dus pa'i gter
mdzes mdzes gcig bsdus 'jam dbyangs gzhon nu'i zhabs
dung dung spyi bor brten no rnam dpyod rtsol
nyog nyog snga ma'i ngag sgros tsam min par
blo gros nyin byed dkyil 'khor bye ba las
legs par 'ongs pa'i legs bshad 'od stong gis
rgyal yum pad tshal ma lus khong nas bzhad
'gro ba spyod ba'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa
de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te
de dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas
bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul
stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas
rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i
chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis
bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul
yi ge dang po ba grags pa
sdom brtson thams cad grags pa yang
ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa
bstan pa de tshes steng du
rnam par nyams shing gnas med la
bstan pa'i gzugs brnyan yid du 'ong
byed par 'gyur ba the tshom med
thams cad byang chub lung bstan te
nga yi byang chub mchog thob 'gyur
de ni 'jig rten skye ba'i mtha'
phreng ba phul bas sems bskyed pa
ma 'ongs dus kyi snyigs mal
'bri dang ldan gyi sa mtshams su
dga' zhes bya ba'i dgon pa 'debs
blo bzang zhes bya'i skyes bu 'byung
'khor ni rnam bzhi rab bsdus nas
chos spyod bcu yi rgyun 'dzugs shing
lha khang ka ba shing lo can
nga yi sku gzugs rnam gnyis la
dbu rgyan dbul zhing mchod pa byed
ston pa'i mdo bzhin gsung sgrogs shing
nga la gsol ba rab btab nas
bstan pa lo stong bar du gnas
de nas 'phos nas shar phyogs su
rmad byung bkod mdzes zhing khams su
seng ge'i nga ro zhes bya pa'i
rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur
de la dad byed zhing der skye
zhing mchog de ni khyad par 'phags
zhes pa'i gzhung 'di byung zhing
rtags gsum la ni mnyam par mtshungs
rnam dbye thams cad la yang ngo
tshig rnams thams cad la yang ste
dbyer med gang de mi zad pa'o
ma rig gnyid ni rgyun bcad cing
yang dag ye shes nges 'byung ba'i
gang zhig rnam pa de sangs rgyas
skyes bu gnyid sangs ji bzhin no
'dzam gling bstan pa'i gnyen gcig de la 'dud
lung rigs 'od stong 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis
thub bstan sa chen 'khor yug gsal byed cing
lung chos padma'i dga' tshal rgyas byed pa
smra ba'i nyi ma gnyis pa gzhan yod min
dpal ldan mkhas pa'i ded dpon gang gi tshig
blo gsal yid mtsho rgyas byed kun na'i gnyen
'khor 'das rang bzhin gsal ston nyi ma ste
lung rigs 'dod 'jo nor bu'i gter kyang yin
dad ldan dar han chos rjes rkyen sbyar te
rigs gzhung bstan bcos 'di nyid bar du sgrub
tshul 'dir dang bas 'brel ba thogs pa kun
gnas skabs tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel
mthar thug sgrib gnyis bag chags las grol te
rnam 'dren rgyal ba'i go 'phang myur thob shog
